front.title: Federations for the Domain Policy DDDS Application

abstract.t: This documents defines the policy-type for federations within the Domain Policy DDDS Application. Using this policy-type domain-owners can announce their membership in a federation and thus their willingness to accept incoming communications according to the rules of that federation. Such federations can be used to establish selective peerings e.g. in the Voice over IP and Instant Messaging space.
